title: Assessment of thermohydraulic performance and entropy generation in an evacuated tube solar collector employing pure water and nanofluids as working fluids
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Oscar A. López-Núñez, F. Lara, A. González-Angeles, A. Cardenas-Robles, J.J. Ramírez-Minguela, J. Arturo Alfaro-Ayala
